summary: This release introduces the new real-time collaboration engine, improves dashboard performance by 40%, and resolves several critical authentication bugs reported by enterprise customers.

features.title: Real-time Collaboration Engine
features.description: Multiple users can now edit documents simultaneously with live cursor tracking and conflict resolution.

features.title: Dashboard Performance Overhaul
features.description: Rewrote the analytics dashboard using virtualized rendering. Load times reduced from 3.2s to 0.8s on average.

features.title: Bulk Export API
features.description: New endpoint POST /v2/exports/bulk allows exporting up to 10,000 records in a single request with streaming response.

fixes.title: SSO token refresh loop
fixes.description: Fixed an infinite redirect loop that occurred when SAML tokens expired during an active session.

fixes.title: CSV export encoding
fixes.description: Resolved UTF-8 BOM handling that caused garbled characters in exported CSV files opened in Excel.

fixes.title: Rate limiter false positives
fixes.description: Corrected a race condition in the distributed rate limiter that incorrectly throttled legitimate API requests under high concurrency.

breaking_changes.title: Removed deprecated /v1/users endpoint
breaking_changes.description: The /v1/users endpoint has been removed. Migrate to /v2/users which supports pagination and field selection.

breaking_changes.title: Changed authentication header format
breaking_changes.description: Bearer tokens must now include the 'v2:' prefix. Old format: 'Bearer abc123'. New format: 'Bearer v2:abc123'.
breaking_changes.migration: Update your auth middleware to prepend 'v2:' to all issued tokens.
